resources.name: OWASP EKS Goat
resources.description: Intentionally vulnerable AWS EKS environment with 20+ attack-defense labs simulating real-world misconfigurations, IAM flaws, and pod breakout paths.

resources.name: Kubernetes Goat
resources.description: Interactive Kubernetes security learning platform with guided workbook for GKE, EKS, AKS, or K3S.
